about_the_game:
Welcome to Kingsport! Home to the best views, friendliest of neighbors, and base to one of the biggest bootlegging operations on the Atlantic Ocean. Join us as Bruce McKenzie, professional Button Man to the local Kingpin, in his quest to find the killer of his boss and beloved socialite. With his friends and associates that you'll pick along the way discover the truth and seal the fate of the city.

In this demo you will be exploring the prologue of our story, from the moment Bruce McKenzie lands in Kingsport after a two year absence. Explore the areas, fight, talk, and make your choices. This is a slice of what will be in the full release as we continue developing a full city with a compelling mystery that will lead you far and wide.

Hand Drawn Visuals

From the sprites, the animation, the backgrounds, and our full comic book, every line is carefully drawn by our fantastic artists. We pay great attention to detail and draw from multiple inspirations of comic books in the 1920's and 30's. We always look for references and inspirations that will allow us to provide an authentic experience with reverence to the places we're depicting.

Bug Report

Join our Discord to report bugs and follow up on our development!

Features

  • Two city streets to explore along with locations to visit within them.

  • beat 'em up combat.

  • one companion to explore the town alongside you.

  • A sample of our puzzles.

  • Branching story based on choices.

  • A digital comic book sample.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content.

short_description: Button Man is a side-scrolling adventure game set in a fictional Nova Scotia during prohibition. After years of being the henchmen to the local bootlegging kingpin your job now is to find who killed him and protect the town from what’s coming to it. Explore Kingsport and learn the truth!
